de.eckhartarnold.client

Interface ImagePanel.DisplayListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Slideshow.ImageDisplayListener
    Enclosing class:
    ImagePanel

    public static interface ImagePanel.DisplayListener
    Interface for event listeners of ImagePanel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDisplay()
      Called by the time a new image is fully displayed (i.e. loaded and faded in).
      void onFade()
      Called when image starts fading.

    • Method Detail

      • onDisplay

        void onDisplay()
        Called by the time a new image is fully displayed (i.e. loaded and faded in).

      • onFade

        void onFade()
        Called when image starts fading. onFade() will not be called if fading is disabled or skipped for some other reason!
